00038 
00039 void printMallinfo(int pos = 0) {
00040 #if HAVE_MALLOC
00041   struct mallinfo mi = mallinfo();
00042   cout << endl << endl << "Dynamic memory (" << pos << "): " << mi.arena << endl << endl;
00043 #else
00044   cout << endl << endl << "No dynamic memory info for this system" << endl;
00045 #endif
00046 }

00049 
00050 
00051 string mcs::UserThread::wpath(string fn)
00052 {
00053   string s;
00054 
00055   fn = subst(fn, " "      , ""); // blanks
00056   fn = subst(fn, "\\.\\." , ""); // ..
00057   fn = subst(fn, "\\\\"   , ""); // backslash
00058   fn = subst(fn, "\\\""   , ""); // double quotes
00059   fn = subst(fn, "\\\'"   , ""); // single quotes
00060 
00061   //s = env->path;
00062   s = ".";
00063   if (env->cl_work) {
00064       if (env->cl_work_cid)
00065       s += string("/U") + string(tid());
00066       else
00067       s += string("/") + user;
00068 
00069       s += "/";
00070   }
00071 
00072   return s + fn;
00073 }

00076 
00077 RetValue mcs::UserThread::Send(Event e, bool log)
00078 {
00079     sock->print(e.codemsg());
00080     e.lmsg = " >" + e.lmsg;  //Friendness of UserThread to Event class
00081     if (log) Log(e);
00082     return e.type();
00083 }

00087 RetValue mcs::UserThread::Send(Data& data)
00088 {
00089 //    void* buf = NULL;
00090 //    unsigned int size = data.prepareBuffer((void**) &buf);
00091 //    Serializable sss(buf, size);
00092 //  
00093 //    Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SENDDATA_START, 1 )); //1 is for a Data object
00094 //    sock->sendData(&sss);
00095 //    Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DATA_STOP ));
00096 //    free(buf);
00097 //    return OK;
00098 
00099     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SENDDATA_START, 1 )); //1 is for a Data object
00100     sock->sendData(&data);
00101     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DATA_STOP ));
00102     return OK;
00103 }

00105 
00106 RetValue mcs::UserThread::Send(Record& vec)
00107 {
00108 //    void* buf = NULL;
00109 //    unsigned int size = vec.prepareBuffer((void**) &buf);
00110 //    Serializable sss(buf, size);
00111 //
00112 //    Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SENDDATA_START, 2 )); //2 is for a Record object
00113 //    sock->sendData(&sss);
00114 //    Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DATA_STOP ));
00115 //    free(buf);
00116 //    return OK;
00117 
00118     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SENDDATA_START, 2 )); //2 is for a Record object
00119     sock->sendData(&vec);
00120     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DATA_STOP ));
00121     return OK;
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00125 RetValue mcs::UserThread::Send(string filename, string path)
00126 {
00127     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SENDFILE_START, filename.csz ));
00128     Serializable sss(path, env->cl_chunksize);
00129     sock->sendData(&sss);
00130     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_FILE_STOP ));
00131     return OK;
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 RetValue mcs::UserThread::Send(vector<string> vec)
00136 {
00137     for (unsigned int ui=0; ui<vec.size(); ui++)
00138     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_OUT, vec[ui].c_str() ), false);
00139 
00140   return OK;
00141 }

00145 #if ENABLE_MYSQL
00146 RetValue mcs::UserThread::sendQueryRes()
00147 {
00148   RetValue ret = OK;
00149 
00150   if (query->gotRecordSet()) {
00151     try {
00152       //printMallinfo(1);
00153       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SENDFILE_START, "query.out" ));
00154       //printMallinfo(2);
00155       query->Result2Ascii(wpath("query.out"));
00156       //printMallinfo(3);
00157       Serializable file(wpath("query.out"), env->cl_chunksize);
00158       //printMallinfo(4);
00159       sock->sendData(&file);
00160       //printMallinfo(5);
00161     }
00162     catch (Event& e) {
00163     if (e.type() == FATAL) throw;
00164     ret = Send(e);
00165     }
00166     //printMallinfo();
00167     return Send(MCS_( ret, MSG_DATA_STOP )) ;
00168   }
00169   else return Send(MCS_WARN( MSG_NO_RESULT ));
00170 }
00171 #endif

00175 
00176 void mcs::UserThread::prompt(RetValue ret)
00177 {
00178     switch (ret) {
00179     case OK:
00180         sock->print(MCS_PROMPT_OK);      break;
00181     case WARN:
00182         sock->print(MCS_PROMPT_WARN);    break;
00183     case ERROR:
00184         sock->print(MCS_PROMPT_ERROR);   break;
00185     default:
00186         throw MCS_FATAL(MSG_UNEXPECTED);
00187     }
00188 }
00189 
00190 
00191 void mcs::UserThread::run()
00192 {
00193   string cmd;
00194   bool first = true;
00195   RetValue ret = OK;
00196 
00197   set_cancel_state(false);
00198 
00199   for (;;) {
00200     try {
00201       if (first) {
00202     //A message to the user must be sent inside hk_connect
00203     ret=hk_connect();
00204     if (ret != OK) return;
00205     
00206     sock = new Socket(csocket, env->timeout, 1000, env->ssl_ctx);
00207 
00208     linfo.ipaddress() = sock->ipaddress();
00209     linfo.hostname() = sock->hostname();
00210     
00211     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_WELCOME, env->localhost.csz,
00212              env->appname.csz, env->appvers.csz));
00213     first = false;
00214       }
00215       else {
00216     set_cancel_state(true);
00217     cmd = sock->getline();
00218     set_cancel_state(false);
00219     
00220     //Synchronize with wakeUpClient()
00221     syn.enter();
00222     ret = exec(cmd);
00223     syn.leave();
00224 
00225     //printMallinfo();
00226       }
00227       prompt(ret);
00228     }
00229     catch(Event e) {
00230       //Unlock the mutex
00231       while (syn.count())
00232     syn.leave();
00233 
00234       ret = e.type();
00235 
00236       if (e.type() == FATAL) {
00237     //If the client gives a "bye" command a FATAL exception with
00238     //code BYE will be thrown.
00239     if (e.code() == MSG_BYE) {
00240     
00241       hk_disconnect();
00242     
00243       //Wait until the client closes the connection, this is
00244       //necessary to prevent "Address already in use" errors. The
00245       //try..catch block is necessary because getline() will throw
00246       //an error when the socket close.
00247       try {cmd = sock->getline(); } catch(...) {}
00248     }
00249     else {
00250       Log(e);
00251     }
00252     
00253     Log( MCS_OK(MSG_USERTHREAD_TERMINATING) );
00254     return;
00255       }
00256     }
00257   }
00258 }
00259 
00260 
00261 
00262 RetValue mcs::UserThread::sendStrings(string str)
00263 {
00264   return Send(split(str, "\n"));
00265 }

00267 
00268 void mcs::UserThread::wakeUpClient(Event* e)
00269 {
00270   //syn.enter();
00271   if (state() == MCS_STATE_RUNNING) {
00272     if (e)
00273       Send(*e);
00274     else
00275       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_WAKE_UP) );
00276   }
00277   //syn.leave();
00278 }
00279 
00280 
00281 
00282 #define BEGIN_CMD(A)                             \
00283 if ((!cmd_executed)   &&   (cmd.cmpCmd(A))){     \
00284       cmd_executed=true;                         \
00285 
00286 
00287 #define BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(A)                       \
00288       BEGIN_CMD(A)                               \
00289       if (! loginok) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_NOT_LOGIN);
00290 
00291 
00292 #define CMD_HELP(A)                              \
00293       if (cmd.givenOpt(MCS_OPT_HELP)) {          \
00294           sendStrings(A);                        \
00295           goto lbl_cmdexecuted;                  \
00296       }
00297 
00298 
00299 #define END_CMD goto lbl_cmdexecuted; }
00300 
00301 
00302 RetValue mcs::UserThread::exec(string scmd, string _pars)
00303 {
00304   int i;
00305   unsigned int ui;
00306   string fn, s, tmp;
00307   bool cmd_executed=false;
00308   unsigned int size;
00309 
00310   bool opt_sqascii;
00311   bool opt_sqfits ;
00312   bool opt_force  ;
00313   bool opt_werr   ;
00314   static string bl = " ";
00315 
00316   CommandParser cmd;
00317   RetValue ret=OK;
00318   RetValue sub=OK;
00319 
00320   batchlevel++;
00321 
00322   try {
00323 
00324   scmd += " " + _pars;
00325   cmd.parseCmd(scmd);
00326   if (cmd.cmd().empty()) return OK;
00327 
00328   opt_sqascii = cmd.givenOpt(MCS_OPT_SAVEQUERYASCII);
00329   opt_sqfits  = cmd.givenOpt(MCS_OPT_SAVEQUERYFITS);
00330   opt_force   = cmd.givenOpt(MCS_OPT_FORCE);
00331   opt_werr    = cmd.givenOpt(MCS_OPT_ALL_ERRORS);
00332 
00333   if (batchlevel > 0)
00334     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_BATCH_START, batchlevel, cmd.cline().csz ));
00335 
00336   if (cmd.cmpCmd(MCS_CMD_PASSWORD)) {
00337       Log(MCS_OK( MSG_LOG_COMMAND, "*** PASSWORD ***" ));
00338   }
00339   else if (cmd.cmpCmd(MCS_CMD_NOP))  //Don't log NOP commands.
00340     ;
00341   else if (cmd.cmpCmd(MCS_CMD_CLIENT_INFO))
00342     Log(MCS_OK( MSG_LOG_COMMAND, cmd.cline().csz ));
00343   else {
00344     Log(MCS_OK( MSG_LOG_COMMAND, cmd.cline().csz ));
00345     linfo.lastCommand() = cmd.cline().substr(0, linfo.lastCommand().maxLength());
00346     linfo.timeLastCommand().settimenow();
00347     linfo.commandExecuted() = linfo.commandExecuted().ival() + 1;
00348   }
00349 
00350 
00351 
00352 #if ! ENABLE_CFITSIO
00353   if (opt_sqfits) {
00354       ret=Send(MCS_WARN( MSG_FITS_NOT_COMPILED ));
00355       opt_sqfits = false;
00356   }
00357 #endif
00358 
00359 #if ! ENABLE_MYSQL
00360   if ((opt_sqfits)   ||   (opt_sqascii)) {
00361       cmd_exected = true;
00362       throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_MYSQL_DISABLED);
00363   }
00364 #endif
00365 
00366   //Custom user routine
00367   if (! cmd_executed)
00368       sub = hk_exec(&cmd, cmd_executed);
00369   if (sub > ret) ret = sub;
00370 
00371 
00372   //................................................................
00373   BEGIN_CMD(MCS_CMD_NOP);
00374   END_CMD;
00375 
00376 
00377   //................................................................
00378   BEGIN_CMD(MCS_CMD_CID);
00379   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_CID_HELP);
00380   Send(MCS_OK( MSG_CLIENT_ID, id(), env->cl_chunksize));
00381   END_CMD;
00382 
00383   //................................................................
00384   BEGIN_CMD(MCS_CMD_CLIENT_INFO);
00385   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_CLIENT_INFO_HELP);
00386   setActiveRS(env->server->getAll_ClientInfo(), true);
00387   END_CMD;
00388 
00389 
00390   //................................................................
00391   BEGIN_CMD(MCS_CMD_CLOSECLIENT);
00392   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_CLOSECLIENT_HELP);
00393   Send(MCS_OK( MSG_BYE ));
00394   throw MCS_FATAL(MSG_BYE);
00395   END_CMD;
00396 
00397 
00398   //................................................................
00399   BEGIN_CMD(MCS_CMD_USERNAME);
00400   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_USERNAME_HELP);
00401   if (cmd.argc() >= 1) {
00402       user=cmd.arg(0).sval();
00403       linfo.username() = user;
00404   }
00405   Send(MCS_OK( MSG_WELCOMEUSER, user.csz ));
00406   END_CMD;
00407 
00408 
00409   //................................................................
00410   BEGIN_CMD(MCS_CMD_PASSWORD);
00411   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_PASSWORD_HELP);
00412   if (cmd.argc() >= 1) pass=cmd.arg(0).sval();
00413   Send(MCS_OK( MSG_PASSWORD ));
00414   END_CMD;
00415 
00416 
00417   //................................................................
00418   BEGIN_CMD(MCS_CMD_DBNAME);
00419   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_DBNAME_HELP);
00420   if (cmd.argc() >= 1) dbname=cmd.arg(0).sval();
00421   Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DBNAME, dbname.csz ));
00422   END_CMD;
00423 
00424 
00425   //................................................................
00426 #ifdef MCS_HAVE_DBH_CMD
00427   BEGIN_CMD(MCS_CMD_DBHOST);
00428   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_DBHOST_HELP);
00429   if (cmd.argc() >= 1) dbhost=cmd.arg(0).sval();
00430   Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DBHOST, dbhost.csz ));
00431   END_CMD;
00432 #endif
00433 
00434 
00435   //................................................................
00436   BEGIN_CMD(MCS_CMD_DBCONNECT);
00437   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_DBCONNECT_HELP);
00438   if (loginok) throw MCS_WARN(MSG_ALREADY_CONNECTED);
00439 
00440   if (env->cl_custom_auth) {
00441       ret = hk_auth(grants, loginok);
00442       if (ret == OK)
00443       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_CONNECTED, " " ));
00444   }
00445   else {
00446 #if ENABLE_MYSQL
00447       //Check for the presence of values
00448       if      (user.empty()  ) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_MISSING_FIELD, "username");
00449       else if (pass.empty()  ) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_MISSING_FIELD, "password");
00450       else if (dbname.empty()) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_MISSING_FIELD, "db name" );
00451       else if (dbhost.empty()) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_MISSING_FIELD, "db host" );
00452       else {
00453       db.connect(user, pass, dbname, dbhost);
00454       query = new Query(&db, false);
00455       if (env->cl_read_grants) {
00456           query->query("select grants from users where username='"
00457                + user + "'", true);
00458           if (query->gotRecordSet() && query->nRows() == 1 ) {
00459           grants = query->rec()[0].ival();
00460           Log(MCS_OK( MSG_USER_HAS_GRANTS, user.csz, grants ));
00461           }
00462           else
00463           throw MCS_FATAL(MSG_GRANTS_CANTGET_GRANTS);
00464       }
00465       else
00466           grants=MCS_GRANT_ALL;
00467       }
00468 #else
00469       grants = MCS_GRANT_ALL;
00470 #endif
00471 
00472       if (! (grants & MCS_GRANT_LOGIN))
00473       throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_GRANTS_LOGIN);
00474       else {
00475       loginok=true;
00476       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_CONNECTED, dbname.csz ));
00477       }
00478   }
00479 
00480   linfo.logged() = loginok;
00481 
00482   if (env->cl_work) {
00483     unsigned int size;
00484     if (! File_Dir_Exist(wpath(), size))
00485       mkDir(wpath(), MCS_MKDIR_PROTECT);
00486   }
00487 
00488   if (env->cl_autoexec)
00489       sub=exec(MCS_CMD_EXEC, "auto");
00490   END_CMD;
00491 
00492 
00493   //................................................................
00494 //  BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_CLOSE_DB_CONN);
00495 //#if ENABLE_MYSQL
00496 //  db.close();
00497 //#endif
00498 //  Send(MCS_OK( MSG_CLOSE_DB_CONN ));
00499 //  loginok=false;
00500 //  END_CMD;
00501 
00502 
00503 #if ENABLE_MYSQL
00504   //................................................................
00505   BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_QUERY);
00506   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_QUERY_HELP);
00507   if (! env->cl_have_db) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_DB_ERR_NOTACTIVATED);
00508   if (! (grants & MCS_GRANT_QUERY)) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_GRANTS_QUERY);
00509 
00510   s=cmd.allargs();
00511   query->query(s, true);
00512 
00513   if (query->gotRecordSet()) {
00514       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DB_QRY_OK ));
00515       setActiveRS(query, false);
00516 
00517       if (opt_sqfits) {
00518 #if ENABLE_CFITSIO
00519     //query->Result2Fits(wpath(fnout));
00520 #endif
00521     opt_sqfits=false;
00522       }
00523       else if (opt_sqascii) {
00524       query->Result2Ascii(wpath(fnout));
00525       opt_sqascii=false;
00526       }
00527   }
00528   else
00529       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DB_ROWSAFF, query->nAffectedRows() ));
00530   END_CMD;
00531 
00532 
00534   //BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_ROWS);
00535   //CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_ROWS_HELP);
00536   //if (! env->cl_have_db) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_DB_ERR_NOTACTIVATED);
00537   //if (! query->gotRecordSet()) throw MCS_WARN(MSG_NO_RESULT);
00538   //
00539   //if (query->gotRecordSet())
00540   //    Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DB_ROWSAFF, query->nRows() ));
00541   //END_CMD;
00542 
00543 
00545   //BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_FIELDS);
00546   //CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_FIELDS_HELP);
00547   //if (! env->cl_have_db) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_DB_ERR_NOTACTIVATED);
00548   //if (! query->gotRecordSet()) throw MCS_WARN(MSG_NO_RESULT);
00549   //
00550   //Send( query->ExecutionDetails() );
00551   //END_CMD;
00552 
00553 
00554   //................................................................
00555   BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_SENDQUERYRES);
00556   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_SENDQUERYRES_HELP);
00557   if (! env->cl_have_db) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_DB_ERR_NOTACTIVATED);
00558   if (! (grants & MCS_GRANT_GET)) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_GRANTS_GET);
00559   if (! query->gotRecordSet()) throw MCS_WARN(MSG_NO_RESULT);
00560 
00561   sub=sendQueryRes();
00562   END_CMD;
00563 
00564 
00565   //................................................................
00566   BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_RECORD);
00567   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_RECORD_HELP);
00568   if (! env->cl_have_db) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_DB_ERR_NOTACTIVATED);
00569   if (! (grants & MCS_GRANT_GET)) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_GRANTS_GET);
00570   if (! rs) throw MCS_WARN(MSG_NO_RESULT);
00571 
00572   unsigned int pos = cmd.arg(0).ival();
00573   if (pos == rs->pos())
00574     Send(rs->rec());
00575   else if (pos == rs->pos()+1) {
00576     if (rs->setNext())
00577       Send(rs->rec());
00578     else
00579       Send( MCS_OK(MSG_FETCH_EOF) );
00580   }
00581   else {
00582     rs->setPos(pos);
00583     Send(rs->rec());
00584   }
00585   END_CMD;
00586 
00587 
00588   //................................................................
00589   BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_TABLELIST);
00590   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_TABLELIST_HELP);
00591   if (! env->cl_have_db) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_DB_ERR_NOTACTIVATED);
00592 
00593   s = "SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = '"
00594     + dbname + "' AND TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'";
00595   exec(MCS_CMD_QUERY + bl + s);
00596   //query->readTableList();
00597   //Send( query->tableList );
00598   END_CMD;
00599 
00600 
00601   //................................................................
00602   BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_TABLEINFO);
00603   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_TABLEINFO_HELP);
00604   if (! env->cl_have_db) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_DB_ERR_NOTACTIVATED);
00605   if ((cmd.argc() < 1)   ||   (cmd.arg(0).sval().empty()))
00606       throw MCS_WARN(MSG_MISSING_FIELD, "table name");
00607 
00608   s = "SELECT * FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = '"
00609     + dbname + "' AND TABLE_NAME = '" + cmd.arg(0).sval() + "'";
00610 
00611   exec(MCS_CMD_QUERY + bl + s);
00612   //exec(MCS_CMD_QUERY + bl + "DESCRIBE " + cmd.arg(0).sval());
00613   //Send( query->tableInfo(cmd.arg(0).sval()) );
00614   END_CMD;
00615 
00616 #endif  //ENABLE_MYSQL
00617 
00618 
00619 
00620   //................................................................
00621   BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_EXEC);
00622   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_EXEC_HELP);
00623   if (! (grants & MCS_GRANT_SCRIPTS)) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_GRANTS_SCRIPT);
00624 
00625   s = fn = cmd.arg(0).sval();
00626   i = chkExt(fn);
00627 
00628   if ((i == MCS_FT_BIN)   ||   (i == MCS_FT_SCRIPT)) {
00629 #if ENABLE_DEBUG
00630     tmp = fn + " " + cmd.line_afterToken(1);
00631     Log(MCS_OK( MSG_SCRIPT_START, tmp.csz ));
00632 #endif
00633     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SCRIPT_START, s.csz ));
00634 
00635     i = spawn(fn, cmd.line_afterToken(1),
00636           wpath(), itos(id()),
00637           user, pass, dbname,
00638           wpath(fnout), wpath(fnerr));
00639     if (i != 0)
00640       throw MCS_WARN(MSG_SCRIPT_ERROR, i);
00641 
00642     Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SCRIPT_STOP, s.csz ));
00643   }
00644   else {
00645     string c="";
00646     bool had_warn = false;
00647     bool had_err  = false;
00648     bool stop = false;
00649     vector<string> vec = cmd.replPars_onFile(fn);
00650     if (i == MCS_FT_BATCH)
00651       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_BATCH_START, batchlevel,  s.csz ));
00652     if (i == MCS_FT_SQL)  {
00653 #if ENABLE_MYSQL
00654       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SQL_START, s.csz )); c = MCS_CMD_QUERY;
00655 #else
00656       throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_DB_NOT_COMPILED);
00657 #endif
00658     }
00659 
00660     for (ui=0; ui<vec.size(); ui++) {
00661 
00662       sub=exec(c.csz, vec[ui]);
00663 
00664       switch(sub) {
00665       case OK:
00666     break;
00667       case WARN:
00668     had_warn = true;
00669     if (opt_werr) stop = true;
00670     break;
00671       case ERROR:
00672     had_err  = true;
00673     if (! opt_force) stop = true;
00674     break;
00675       case FATAL:
00676     throw MCS_FATAL(MSG_UNEXPECTED);
00677     break;  //Is unexpected because an exception should be thrown
00678       }
00679 
00680       if (stop) break;
00681     }
00682 
00683     if (had_err)       ret = ERROR;
00684     else if (had_warn) ret = WARN;
00685     else               ret = OK;
00686 
00687     if (i == MCS_FT_BATCH)  Send(MCS_OK( MSG_BATCH_STOP, batchlevel ));
00688     if (i == MCS_FT_SQL) {
00689       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SQL_STOP ));
00690 
00691       if ((ret == OK)   &&   query->gotRecordSet()) {
00692     if (opt_sqfits) {
00693 #if ENABLE_CFITSIO
00694       //query->Result2Fits(wpath(fnout));
00695 #endif
00696       opt_sqfits=false;
00697     }
00698     else if (opt_sqascii) {
00699       query->Result2Ascii(wpath(fnout));
00700       opt_sqascii=false;
00701     }
00702       }
00703     }
00704   }
00705   END_CMD;
00706 
00707 
00708   //................................................................
00709   BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_GET);
00710   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_GET_HELP);
00711   if (! (grants & MCS_GRANT_GET)) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_GRANTS_GET);
00712 
00713   fn = wpath(fnout);
00714   s  = fnout;
00715   if (cmd.argc() == 1) {
00716       fn = wpath(cmd.arg(0).sval());
00717       s  = cmd.arg(0).sval();
00718   }
00719 
00720   ret = Send(s, fn);
00721   END_CMD;
00722 
00723 
00724 
00725 //This has been commented because data in the "send" vector are automatically
00726 //sent after each command.
00727 //  //................................................................
00728 //  BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_GETDATA);
00729 //  CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_GETDATA_HELP);
00730 //  if (! (grants & MCS_GRANT_GET)) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_GRANTS_GET);
00731 //  if (cmd.argc() < 1) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_MISSING_FIELD, "object index");
00732 //
00733 //  ui = cmd.arg(0).ival();
00734 //  if (ui < send.count()) {
00735 //      tbuf = NULL;
00736 //      size = send.pop(ui).prepareBuffer((void**) &tbuf);
00737 //      Serializable sss(tbuf, size);
00738 //
00739 //      Send(MCS_OK( MSG_SENDDATA_START, 1 )); //1 is for a Data object
00740 //      sock->sendData(&sss);
00741 //      Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DATA_STOP ));
00742 //      free(tbuf);
00743 //  }
00744 //  else
00745 //      throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_INDEX_OUT_RANGE, ui, send.count());
00746 //  END_CMD;
00747 
00748 
00749   //................................................................
00750   BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_PUT);
00751   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_PUT_HELP);
00752   if (! (grants & MCS_GRANT_PUT)) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_GRANTS_PUT);
00753   if (cmd.argc() < 1) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_MISSING_FIELD, "file name, size");
00754 
00755   s  = cmd.arg(0).sval();
00756   if (strchr(s.c_str(), '/')) {  //A path is specified
00757     if (s[0] == '/')
00758       throw MCS_ERROR( MSG_NO_ABSOLUTE_PATH, s );
00759 
00760     if (strstr(s.c_str(), ".."))
00761       throw MCS_ERROR( MSG_NO_DOUBLEDOT_PATH, s );
00762 
00763     string subdir = wpath(s);
00764     int loc = subdir.rfind('/');
00765     subdir.resize(loc);
00766     unsigned int size;
00767     if (! File_Dir_Exist(subdir, size))
00768       mkDir(subdir, MCS_MKDIR_PROTECT);
00769   }
00770   fn = wpath(s);
00771   size = cmd.arg(1).ulval();
00772 
00773   Send(MCS_OK( MSG_RECVFILE_START, s.csz ));
00774   sock->recvData(fn);
00775   ret = Send(MCS_OK( MSG_FILE_STOP, s.csz ));
00776   END_CMD;
00777 
00778 
00779   //................................................................
00780   BEGIN_CMD_LOGIN(MCS_CMD_PUTDATA);
00781   CMD_HELP(MCS_CMD_PUTDATA_HELP);
00782   if (! (grants & MCS_GRANT_PUT)) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_GRANTS_PUT);
00783   if (cmd.argc() < 1) throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_MISSING_FIELD, "size");
00784 
00785   size = cmd.arg(0).ulval();
00786   Send(MCS_OK( MSG_RECVDATA_START ));
00787   char* tbuf = NULL;
00788   size = sock->recvData(&tbuf, 0);
00789 
00790   Data d(tbuf);
00791   d.setSourceID(MCS_ID_CLIENT);
00792   d.setDestID(userID());
00793   recv.addField(d);
00794 
00795   Send(MCS_OK( MSG_DATA_STOP ));
00796 
00797   if (cmd.givenOpt(MCS_OPT_LOOP)) {
00798       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_COPYING_DATA_OBJECTS, "send Record" ));
00799       send.addField(d);
00800   }
00801 
00802   free(tbuf);
00803   END_CMD;
00804 
00805 
00806   //................................................................
00807   if (! cmd_executed)
00808       throw MCS_ERROR(MSG_SYNTAX, cmd.cline().csz);
00809 
00810 
00811   lbl_cmdexecuted:
00812   ; //Continue from here if the command has been excuted
00813 
00814 
00815 //Eventually send objects in the send Record
00816   if (ret == OK)
00817       while (send.count()) {
00818       Data d = send.pop();
00819       Send(d);
00820       }
00821 
00822   hk_postexec(&cmd, ret);
00823 
00824   if (batchlevel > 0)
00825       Send(MCS_OK( MSG_BATCH_STOP, batchlevel ));
00826 
00827 
00828   }   // try
00829   catch(Event e) {
00830       if (e.type() != FATAL)
00831       ret = Send(e);
00832       else
00833       throw e;
00834   }
00835 
00836   batchlevel--;
00837   return ret;
00838 }
00839 
00840 
00841 
00842 mcs::UserThread::UserThread(Thread* parent, int lID, int newsock) :
00843   BaseThread(parent, lID),
00844   syn(),
00845   recv(true)
00846 {
00847   Log(MCS_OK( MSG_THREAD_CREATE, "UserThread" ));
00848   //printMallinfo();
00849 
00850   sock = NULL;
00851 
00852   syn.synchronize(true);
00853 
00854   csocket = 0;
00855   if (newsock) {
00856     csocket = newsock;
00857   }
00858 
00859   loginok=false;
00860   grants=0;
00861   batchlevel=-1;
00862 
00863   fnout="out";
00864   fnerr="err";
00865 
00866   dbhost="localhost";
00867   dbname=env->appname;
00868 
00869   linfo.id() = lID;
00870   linfo.timeConnetcted().settimenow();
00871 
00872   luserid = MCS_ID_UNKNOWN;
00873 
00874 #if ENABLE_MYSQL
00875   if (env->cl_have_db)
00876       query = NULL;
00877 #endif
00878 
00879   rs = NULL;
00880 }
00881 
00882 
00883 void mcs::UserThread::setActiveRS(RecordSet* rs, bool delWhenFinished)
00884 {
00885   if ( (this->rs)   &&   (deleters) )
00886     delete this->rs;
00887 
00888   this->rs = rs;
00889   deleters = delWhenFinished;
00890 
00891   Record* tmp = rs->prepRecToSend();
00892 
00893   Send(*tmp);
00894   delete tmp;
00895   Send( MCS_OK( MSG_NEW_RECORDSET ) );
00896 }
00897 
00898 
00899 mcs::UserThread::~UserThread()
00900 {
00901   if ( (this->rs)   &&   (deleters) )
00902     delete rs;
00903 
00904   if (env->cl_work   &&   env->cl_clean_logout)
00905     rmDir(wpath());
00906 
00907   if (sock) {
00908     delete sock;
00909     sock = NULL;
00910   }
00911 
00912 #if ENABLE_MYSQL
00913   if (env->cl_have_db)
00914     try { if (query) delete query;  }
00915     catch (Event &e) {}
00916 #endif
00917 
00918   //printMallinfo();
00919 
00920   Log(MCS_OK( MSG_THREAD_DESTROY, "UserThread" ));
00921 }

00925 ClientInfo& mcs::UserThread::info()
00926 {
00927   return linfo;

00931 
00932 RetValue mcs::UserThread::hk_exec(CommandParser* cmd, bool& cmd_executed)
00933 {
00934     RetValue ret = OK;
00935     cmd_executed = false;
00936 
00937     if (env->server->cb_exec)
00938     ret = (*(env->server->cb_exec))(cmd, cmd_executed);
00939 
00940     if (env->server->cbwa_exec)
00941     (*(env->server->cbwa_exec))();
00942 
00943     return ret;
00944 }
00945 
00946 void mcs::UserThread::hk_postexec(CommandParser* cmd, RetValue ret)
00947 {
00948     if (env->server->cb_postexec)
00949     (*(env->server->cb_postexec))(cmd, ret);
00950 
00951     if (env->server->cbwa_postexec)
00952     (*(env->server->cbwa_postexec))();
00953 }
00954 
00955 RetValue mcs::UserThread::hk_connect()
00956 {
00957     RetValue ret = OK;
00958 
00959     if (env->server->cb_connect)
00960     ret = (*(env->server->cb_connect))();
00961 
00962     if (env->server->cbwa_connect)
00963     (*(env->server->cbwa_connect))();
00964 
00965   return ret;
00966 }
00967 
00968 void mcs::UserThread::hk_disconnect()
00969 {
00970     if (env->server->cb_disconnect)
00971         (*(env->server->cb_disconnect))();
00972 }
00973 
00974 
00975 RetValue mcs::UserThread::hk_auth(int& grants, bool& loginok)
00976 {
00977     RetValue ret = OK;
00978     grants = MCS_GRANT_ALL;
00979     loginok = true;
00980 
00981     if (env->server->cb_auth)
00982     ret = (*(env->server->cb_auth))(grants, loginok);
00983 
00984     if (env->server->cbwa_auth)
00985     (*(env->server->cbwa_auth))();
00986 
00987     return ret;
00988 }

01000   ret = user;

01011 
01012 void mcs::UserThread::send2OtherThread(Data& d, int dest)
01013 {
01014   d.setSourceID(userID());
01015   d.setDestID(dest);
01016   env->server->dispatch.addField(d);
01017 }
